en: People ask you concerning the Hour.
Say, "Knowledge of it is only with Allah.
And what may make you perceive?
Indeed, Allah has cursed the disbelievers
Indeed, Allah has cursed the disbelievers
and prepared for them a Blaze.
they will not find a protector or a helper.
The Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire,
The Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire,
they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah
they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah
they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah
